channel.title: Question About Scar
channel.description: I have had scar for a while now and when aryan came out i used aryan, so i was just wondering how much scar is detectable by jagex now? (Since the new "anti Macro" system came)

item.title: Question About Scar
item.dc:creator: @db_cheater db_cheater
item.description:
@db_cheater wrote:

If you use srl, with the correct settings you can auto 24/7/365

Read full topic

item.title: Question About Scar
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

When i used to use scar i used it on my main but aryan banned my main. People say there is a chance of getting detected however unless your an autoing whore you have nothing to worry about. Right now its all about the randoms

Read full topic

item.title: Question About Scar
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

dont worry too much about being banned with scar.unless of course you just auto ridiculously like for long periods of time.i started using scar back about 2 months before kaitnieks went down and still using it and i have never got an account banned =) but i suggest u dont use it on your main because there IS a chance u could get banned.

Read full topic
